scripts.build: mkdir -p bin && rm -f bin/lambda.zip && zip -r bin/lambda.zip node_modules package.json package-lock.json readme.md src
scripts.build-windows: if not exist bin mkdir bin && if exist bin\lambda.zip del bin\lambda.zip && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path node_modules, package.json, package-lock.json, readme.md, src -DestinationPath bin\lambda.zip -Force"
